extensionDescription.message: Upload large attachments to your Nextcloud instead of sending them by email

serverUrl_details.message: The base URL of the Nextcloud server; if your server runs on a non-standard port, put it into the URL.

username_details.message: Your username on your Nextcloud server

password_details.message: An app token (preferable) or password. The Add-On tries to convert it into an app token before storing it. But if that fails, your password is stored unencrypted.

storageFolder_details.message: The path where the files are stored in your Nextcloud (must begin with a '/')

useDlPassword_details.message: This password must comply to the rules the admin of your Nextcloud enforces (eg. length, character set, ...). Otherwise the upload will fail. Tell this password to the recipients; they will need it to download the attachment.
